result.execSummary:
The defendant Donte D Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Marijuana. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donte D Thompson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Suspension of drivers license for failure to pay

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donte D Thompson in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wiscon sin.   Court amends charge to  Possession of THC pursuant to County Ord. 24.01
Defendant plead  NO CONTEST.  Court found the defendant guilty.   Court ordered defendant to pay a forfeiture of $484.00 inclusive of court costs, surcharges, and penalty assessments payable within SIXTY (60) days from today with a due date of 2-22-16 or civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.
The Court granted a stay of 30 days from today with notification by Clerk of Circuit Court, Criminal Division.  Failure to pay will result in defendant's driving privileges suspended for 3 years.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47. lr  Jury trial scheduled for 02-29-2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Donte D Thompson not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed. Court in jury trial.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-18-2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Donte D Thompson not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests an adjourned Plea and Sentencing. Court granted defense request. Case adjourned to branch 47.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Donte D Thompson in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests a Plea and Sentencing date. Court granted defense request. Case adjourned to branch 47.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no controlled substances without a valid prescription. 
DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 3:00 P.M. ON  (05/12/2015). IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Donte D Thompson in court.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 47  for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 05-11-2015 at 01:30pm
